scripts.base:pull: cd astro && git pull origin main
scripts.insert: mkdir -p astro/public && cp -r posts/ astro/src/content/ && cp -r images/ astro/public/ && cp -r config/ astro/src/
scripts.dev: cd astro && yarn install && npx astro dev
scripts.dev:first: rm -rf astro && yarn base:clone && yarn insert && yarn dev
